# Appendix
## 5b
```{r}
mean_1 <- 150.03
mean_2 <- 139.18
s_1 <- 27.49
s_2 <- 27.49
n_1 <- 266
n_2 <- 234
s_p_squared <- (s_1**2 * (n_1 - 1) + s_2**2 * (n_2 - 1)) / (n_1 + n_2 - 2)

(mean_1 - mean_2) / sqrt(s_p_squared * (1 / n_1 + 1 / n_2))
```
